name: Guns 2: The Game
description:
MULTIPLAYER ONLY WORKS FOR OTHER ITCH.IO PLAYERS NO SCRATCH PLAYERS!!!

---

Only the windows download will receive multiple updates!

MacOS Will receive IMPORTANT updates ONLY!

Linux will receive only 1 update within 5 updates of the original.

example: Windows: v1.2 - Linux: v0.4

1 update = v0.1

--

Guns 2: The Game

-----

This is a game that has online capabilities!

----------

-- ITCH.IO DOES NOT SUPPORT ONLINE!!!

-----------

YOU MUST BE A SCRATCHER TO PLAY ONLINE.

please not there will be bugs.

THIS IS IN BETA. AND WILL NOT BE FULLY READY UNTILL 2022-2023.

Progress is going fast!!!

-----------

CONTROLS:

Space or click to shoot

WASD to move

---

Please note:

There will be no active update log so that you can check previous updates. You will only be able to see the current updates
